content: additional material stuffing and yarn needle gauge is not critical made with materials called for the toy is about 3 1/2 9 cm tall for a 6 15 cm toy crochet with two strands of yarn and a 6 mm j hook this mouse is the first in a set of four pocket animals along with a rabbit 1 a racoon 2 and a robin 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pocket-animals---rabbit 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pocket-animals---raccoon 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pocket-animals---robin
